lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project dialog first)
1. Set up the correct JDK version, as follows:
1. Click `Configure` > `Structure for New Projects` and then `Project Settings` > `Project` > `Project SDK`
1. If JDK 11 is listed in the drop down, select it. If it is not, click `New...` and select the directory where you installed JDK 11
1. Import the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.

1. After the importing is complete, locate the `src/main/java/nite.Nite.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run nite.Nite.main()`. If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below:

* A launcher class to workaround classpath issues.
* A GUI for Duke using FXML.
* Represents the Duke chat-bot, called Nite.
* Nite is an interactive app which helps to keep track of tasks.

* Represents an UnknownCommand where user input is unclear.

"I'm sorry, but I don't know what \"%s\" means :-(\n"

<Label fx:id="dialog" lineSpacing="1.0" minHeight="-Infinity" style="-fx-border-color: #0000ff; -fx-border-radius: 20; -fx-border-width: 1.5; -fx-padding: 5; -fx-background-color: #f0f0ff; -fx-background-radius: 20;" text="Label" textFill="#0000ff" textOverrun="CLIP" wrapText="true">

<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="400.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/11.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="nite.ui.MainWindow">

<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutY="558.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="324.0" promptText="Chat with Nite!" style="-fx-background-color: lightcyan" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0">

<Button fx:id="sendButton" layoutX="324.0" layoutY="558.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="76.0" style="-fx-background-color: lightskyblue" text="Send">
<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" hbarPolicy="NEVER" hvalue="1.0" prefHeight="557.0" prefWidth="400.0" style="-fx-background-color: aquamarine;" vvalue="1.0">
